title.rendered: 10th Anniversary of the Siemens Scholarship Program

content.rendered:
Since 2013, over 1,335 deserving students from 120 colleges across India have been awarded scholarships under the Siemens Scholarship Program to pursue engineering. These bright minds have excelled and secured placements in leading companies across various sectors, including Siemens. They have not only become role models in their communities but have also improved their families’ living conditions.

The program offers four-year scholarships to meritorious engineering students from economically disadvantaged backgrounds. In addition to financial support, students receive valuable opportunities like internships, mechatronics training, soft skills development, projects, and mentorships, enhancing their holistic growth.
